```{r}
overview <- targets::tar_read_raw(glue::glue("overview_{cohort}"))

if(cohort != "efficiencies") {
  admissions_perc <- overview |>
  dplyr::filter(activity_type == "Admissions") |>
  dplyr::pull(perc)
}

beddays_perc <- overview |>
  dplyr::filter(activity_type == "Beddays") |>
  dplyr::pull(perc)

statement <- if(cohort == "efficiencies") { 
  glue::glue("{beddays_perc}% of all emergency beddays") 
} else if (cohort == "zero_los_no_procedure_adult" | cohort == "zero_los_no_procedure_child") {
  glue::glue("{admissions_perc}% of all emergency admissions")
} else {
  glue::glue("{admissions_perc}% of all emergency admissions and {beddays_perc}% of all emergency beddays")
}
```

In 2023/24, `r statement` fall under mitigable activity for the Frail Older People (high frailty) cohort.
